languages.text:
Wielder's Melee attacks have +15% Armour Penetration.
If the target's Armour is less or equal to the Penetration, they must succeed at Toughness (+20) or gain Bleeding 4

traits.locale_text:
Wielder's Melee attacks have +15% Armour Penetration.
If the target's Armour is less or equal to the Penetration, they must succeed at Toughness (+20) or gain Bleeding 4

languages.text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).
languages.original_text:
Атаки персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} получают +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g}.
Если {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} цели меньше или равна пробитию брони персонажа, цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text:
The wearer's melee attacks gain +15% armour penetration.
If the target's armour is less or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a Toughness resistance test with a +20 bonus or suffer bleeding (4).

The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

languages.text:
Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g}, +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeri kazanır.
Hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değeri, giyen kişinin zırh delme değerinden az veya ona eşitse hedef, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanamaya{/g} (4) maruz kalır.
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text:
Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g}, +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeri kazanır.
Hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değeri, giyen kişinin zırh delme değerinden az veya ona eşitse hedef, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanamaya{/g} (4) maruz kalır.

Giyen kişinin yakın dövüş saldırısı, +%15 zırh delme değeri kazanır.
Hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değeri, giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerinden az veya ona eşitse hedef, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde kanamaya (4) maruz kalır.

languages.text:
Los ataques {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador ganan un +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.
Si la armadura del objetivo es menor o igual que la penetración de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del portador, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (4).
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text:
Los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo del portador ganan un +15 % de penetración de armadura.
Si la armadura del objetivo es menor o igual que la penetración de armadura del portador, el objetivo debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir el efecto hemorragia (4).

languages.text:
装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。
命中目标时，如果目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}不高于装备者的护甲穿透，则目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20加值，若未能通过检定，则会获得{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（4）效果。
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text:
装备者的近战攻击获得+15%护甲穿透。
命中目标时，如果目标护甲不高于装备者的护甲穿透，则目标需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中获得+20加值，若未能通过检定，则会获得流血（4）效果。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Trägers erhalten +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}.
Ist die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziel kleiner oder gleich der Rüstungsdurchdringung des Trägers, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von +20 bestehen oder {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (4) erleiden.
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text:
Nahkampfangriffe des Trägers erhalten +15 % Rüstungsdurchdringung.
Ist die Rüstung des Ziel kleiner oder gleich der Rüstungsdurchdringung des Trägers, muss das Ziel eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit mit einem Abzug von +20 bestehen oder Blutung (4) erleiden.

languages.text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} du porteur gagnent +15 % à la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.
Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible est égale ou inférieure à la pénétration d'armure du porteur, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (4).
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text:
Les attaques de mêlée du porteur gagnent +15 % à la pénétration d'armure.
Si l'armure de la cible est égale ou inférieure à la pénétration d'armure du porteur, la cible doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet Saignement (4).

languages.text:
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+15%される。
ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が、使用者のアーマー貫通以下の場合、ターゲットは+20のボーナスで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}（4）状態になる。
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text:
使用者の近接攻撃のアーマー貫通が+15%される。
ターゲットのアーマーが、使用者のアーマー貫通以下の場合、ターゲットは+20のボーナスで耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると出血（4）状態になる。

使用者の近接攻撃のアーマー貫通が+15%される。
ターゲットのアーマーが、使用者のアーマー貫通以下の場合、ターゲットは+20のボーナスで耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると出血（4）状態になる。

languages.text:
Атаки персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} получают +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g}.
Если {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} цели меньше или равна пробитию брони персонажа, цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (4).

If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text:
Атаки персонажа в ближнем бою получают +15% к пробитию брони.
Если броня цели меньше или равна пробитию брони персонажа, цель выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получает кровотечение (4).

Атаки персонажа в ближнем бою получают +15% к пробитию брони.
Если броня цели меньше или равна пробитию брони персонажа, цель выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получает кровотечение (4).
